body_html: @ebrevdo I've tried and failed to track down the commit that modified the behavior of Dataset.unbatch(), but it looks like we're inappropriately converting single-component datasets to tupled datasets. Can you please take a look?
body_text: @ebrevdo I've tried and failed to track down the commit that modified the behavior of Dataset.unbatch(), but it looks like we're inappropriately converting single-component datasets to tupled datasets. Can you please take a look?
body: @ebrevdo I've tried and failed to track down the commit that modified the behavior of `Dataset.unbatch()`, but it looks like we're inappropriately converting single-component datasets to tupled datasets. Can you please take a look?
